Wrongful Dishonor.definition: a wrongful refusal by a payor bank to honor an item that is properly payable [a payor bank is liable to its customer for damages proximately caused by the wrongful dishonor of an item " Uniform Commercial Code "]
Wrongful Dishonor.origin: [a payor bank is liable to its customer for damages proximately caused by the wrongful dishonor of an item " Uniform Commercial Code "]
